title: The best places to eat and drink in Lewisham, according to chef Vivek Singh
text:
Since opening the Cinnamon Club in the old Westminster Library 18 years ago, Vivek Singh’s business has expanded to include four more restaurants, a cocktail bar and even a mobile street food stall.

He has also published eight cookbooks, covering everything from classic curries to festival fare.

When Singh isn’t at one of his restaurants or making the odd Saturday Kitchen appearance, he’s tucking into a beef-cheek curry or sipping craft beer in his home of Lewisham in south London.

Here are some of his favourite local spots.
